column6: company_profile

Chongqing Sansheng Industrial engages in the research and development, production, and sale of building materials and chemicals in China. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Sansheng Special Building Materials and changed its name to in October 2016. It was founded in 2002 and is based in Chongqing, China.

KEFI Minerals engages in the discovery, exploration and exploitation of mineral deposits primarily within Saudi Arabia. It explores for gold and copper mineralisation, as well as precious and base metals. KEFI Minerals was founded in 2006 and is based in Nicosia, Cyprus.

Trident Group is a holding company with a diverse portfolio of businesses, operating primarily in the manufacture and processing of textiles and paper. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Ludhiana, India.
Milly Glass Works is a glass manufacturer based in Mombasa, Kenya. It was incorporated 2000 and its products are mainly sold in Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania and Ethiopia.

Eagle Hills operates as a specialised construction and development firm. The company provides a full construction service for both residential and commercial buildings across Africa and the Middle East. Eagle Hills is headquartered in Abu Dhabi, UAE and was founded in 2014.

Antex Group is the parent company for three subsidiaries acting within various sectors, Antex Fashion Group, DEYU Trading Group and TOWOWGE Culture Media Group.  It operates in a variety of industries, such as fashion, agriculture, forestry, science and technology, film and TV and tourism. Headquartered in Zhejiang, China, the group was founded in 2003.

China Communications Construction Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the infrastructure construction and design, dredging, and heavy machinery manufacturing activities in China and internationally. The company undertakes various infrastructure construction projects, including ports, roads, bridges, railways, tunnels, and other projects. It is also involved in the infrastructure design of ports, roads, and bridges. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.
Calzedonia is a fashion brand. Its products include swimwear and beachwear, tights and stockings, and socks. The company was established in 1986 and is based in Dossobuono, Italy.

Hyatt Hotels, a hospitality company, manages, franchises, owns, and develops Hyatt-branded hotels, resorts, and residential and vacation ownership properties worldwide. The company operates its hotels and resorts under the Park Hyatt, Andaz, Hyatt, Grand Hyatt, Hyatt Regency, Hyatt Place, and Hyatt House brands. Hyatt Hotels is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, US, and was founded in 1957.
CH International Corporation operates as an electronic component manufacturer with a focus on microwave components. The company was established in 2003 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
The Netherlands-based Tuttnauer manufactures autoclaves, plasma sterilizers and washer-disinfectors. The company was founded in 1925 and is based in Breda, the Netherlands.

Albwardy Investment is a holding company founded in 1976 to aggregate various business concerns held by founder Ali Saeed Juma Albwardy. The company operates in food retailing and distribution, construction, engineering, hospitality and hotel proprietary, holding sole ownership, joint venture or stakes in equity. Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, its portfolio consists of 30 companies across the Middle East, Africa, Europe, Asia and south America.

Voxafrica is a bi-lingual, news and general entertainment channel offering programmes and interactive services on cable, satellite, internet, IPTV and also available in hotels throughout Africa. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in London, UK.

K.P.R. Mill Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated apparel manufacturing company in India and internationally. It operates through three segments: textiles, sugar, and others. The company offers yarn, and knitted grey and dyed fabrics, as well as readymade apparel. It also produces sugar; green energy through co-gen power; and wind power, as well as acts as a dealer for AUDI cars. K.P.R. Mill Limited was founded in 1984 and is based in Coimbatore, India.
column36: P. Nataraj, managing director, "Labour costs are about 40%-50% cheaper in Ethiopia. Power costs are also lower by about 50%."

column6: Kingdom is a linen yarn manufacturer. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Henggang, China. It has additional locations across China, in Europe and in Africa.
CH International Corporation operates as an electronic component manufacturer with a focus on microwave components. The company was established in 2003 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

Isuzu Motors manufactures and sells commercial and light commercial vehicles, and engine components worldwide. Its products include heavy, medium, and light-duty trucks; heavy/medium duty busses; pickup trucks; and sports utility vehicles, as well as automotive, marine, and industrial engines. Isuzu Motors Limited sells its products primarily through a network of trading companies and other partners. The company was formerly known as Diesel Automobile Industry and changed its name to Isuzu Motors in July 1949. Isuzu Motors was founded in 1916 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Dubai World, through its subsidiaries, provides transport and logistics, drydocks and maritime, urban development and investment, and financial services. The company offers international marine terminal operations and development, logistics and related services; maritime services to industry and government sectors; and stevedoring services, such as containers, bulk, general and project cargoes, car carriers, reefer vessels stores, passenger vessel stores, and baggage handling. The company is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and was established in 2006.

Soufflet is a cereal collection company. The company processes barley and wheat and trades globally in cereals, oil seeds, and dairy products. It supplies and markets its products to the agricultural and vineyard industries as well as food manufacturers, catering companies, and retailers. The company is based in Nogent sur Seine, France.
column36: A country of 100 million people, Ethiopia is growing in both demographic and economic terms. Ethiopia is also the 4th largest beer-producing country in Africa and this sector is growing strongly. To date, 70% of malt requirements are imported. This market with high potential is very promising for Malteries Soufflet, especially as its main brewing customers are present in the country.

column6: Germany-based Voith Group, an engineering company, provides plants, products, and industrial services for energy, oil and gas, paper, raw materials, and transportation and automotive markets. It operates in four segments Voith Hydro, Voith Industrial Services, Voith Paper, and Voith Turbo. Voith Group was founded in 1825 and is based in Heidenheim an der Brenz, Germany.
column36: Uwe Wehnhardt, chief executive officer, Voith Hydro, explained; "Good market conditions and the proximity to our customers and partners, as well as the hydropower market potential and impressive economic development in recent years, make Ethiopia an ideal base for our new site. Due to the longstanding history of hydropower projects in Ethiopia, there are a large number of well-trained experts in the country."
column37: East Africa including Egypt, Kenya, Sudan, South Sudan, Rwanda, Tanzania, Uganda and Zambia.

column6: Shangtex Holding Co.,Ltd manufactures and supplies industrial textiles in the People's Republic of China. The company offers automotive textiles for car carpets, knitted interiors, headliners, safety belts, coat rack assemblies, car foot pads, molded interiors, interior and decorative fabrics, anti-vibration pads, and fittings. It also provides membrane fabrics and textile composites, architecture and geo-synthetic materials, functional polyester and chemical fiber materials, polysulfonamide and polyester fibers, lyocell and lyocell bamboo fibers, rand underwear's, apparels, knitted fabrics, shirts, suits, casual wear, home textiles, accessories, stocks, dye and cotton yarns, and yarn-dyed fabrics. In addition, the company trades in textiles, apparel, raw industrial materials and products, medical equipment, shoes, bags, luggage, automotive parts, wine, synthetic fibers, and cotton. Further, it provides bonded storage, services trade, cargo breaking, labelling, fashion event, creative, entertainment, wedding photography, fashion designing and magazine, education, and training services; testing services for industrial textiles; textile technology information, environment inspection, textile and civil architecture design, EPC, and electronic commerce services; and investment and financing, textile and garment exhibition, printing and packaging, logistics, real estate management, construction, asset management, industrial park investment and management, and hotel and conference services. Additionally, the company researches and develops textile products, technology, equipment, synthetic fibers, garments, and color weaving products; designs fashion textile fabrics, and textile dyeing and printing technology; designs and develops clothing, apparel, and wool textile fabrics; and licenses brands. It also exports its products. The company operates a distribution network of 8500 points of sales. Shangtex Holding Co.,Ltd is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
column37: Belgium, Brazil, Italy, Poland, Japan, Turkey, the United States and South Africa

column6: Coca-Cola develops non-alcoholic beverages, including Diet Coke, Fanta, Sprite, and Simply. The company was established in 1886 and is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, US.

Fairfax Africa Fund, is an investment firm with a focus on infrastructure, technology and real estate. Through multiple investment platforms, it also provides financing as private equity, venture capital and mezzanine. The company is headquartered in McLean, Virginia, United States.

Krones plans, develops, and manufactures machinery and systems for the fields of process technology, filling and packaging technology, and intralogistics in Germany and internationally. The company operates through three segments: machines and lines for product filling and decoration, machines and lines for beverage production/process technology, and machines and lines for the low output range. It provides plant engineering solutions, such as planning new plants, plant expansion, plant structural planning, and energy and media optimisation. It serves breweries, the soft-drinks sector, and producers of still or sparkling wines and spirits, as well as food and luxury-goods, chemical, cosmetics, and pharmaceutical industries. Krones was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Neutraubling, Germany.
column36: Arie De Keijzer, manager, operations, Ethiopia, said; "We see an overwhelming potential in Ethiopia and a great mutual market for us and the companies we will be involved with."

column6: Compre y Compare, also known as Conservas Celorrio, engages in the production and distribution of fruits and vegetables. It offers tomatoes, asparagus, pickles, peppers, vegetables, fruits and jams, various, mushrooms, pulses, and wines and juices. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Calahorra, Spain with factories in Tauste, Valdivia, and Logrono, Spain; and China.

Nigeria-based Dangote Group, a business conglomerate, engages in the cement, sugar, salt, pasta, beverages and real estate businesses in Africa. Its activities include manufacturing and importing cement, manufacturing and refining sugar, refining salt, milling flour and semolina, port services and haulage. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria.
Monitane Holdings, through its subsidiaries, sells branded and own-label clothing. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Dunstable, UK
Intrade UK engages in the sale of agricultural raw materials, livestock, textile raw materials and semi-finished goods. The company was established in 2009 and is headquartered in London, UK.
Lucky Chain Limited Company engages in renewable energy projects. The company is headquartered in Hong Kong.
column36: "Ethiopia is really a very exciting and dynamic country and we believe that Ethiopia is probably going to be one of the major players in the African market", said chairman Chang Tat Joel.

column6: Turkey-based Tosyali Holding manufactures flat steel and steel pipe products. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
